400-0009: User is still waiting for email-verification.
400-0010: There already is a user with that email.
400-0011: This user's email was already validated.
400-0013: Specified hash is not valid or has expired.
400-0016: Invalid user-changes specified, has bad properties.
403-0001: You are not allowed to access this resource. Either you are not logged in, or you don't have the required authorizations.
403-0002: Wrong Email and/or password, or your account still needs to be activated.
404-0001: No user with that email was found.
404-0002: No user with that ID was found.
